n0:createOraclePackageSpec.n0:source: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PACKAGE "DOCAI_LOG_API" as PROCEDURE log( p_action VARCHAR2, p_source_id NUMBER, p_type VARCHAR2, p_log_lvl VARCHAR2, p_description VARCHAR2, p_title VARCHAR2, p_status_reason VARCHAR2 DEFAULT NULL, p_status_stacktrace CLOB DEFAULT empty_clob() ); end;
